meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>husband</radical> was wearing his <radical>cleat</radical>s when he accidentally stepped on a <radical>bird</radical>. Luckily this particular bird is a <kanji>chicken</kanji>, and chickens are really durable!
readingMnemonic: The only way to stop the <kanji>chicken</kanji> from putting on your husband's cleats and stepping on him to death in revenge is to feed it the <reading>ca</reading>ke (けい) you were making.
